name: ugd10a
description: Collection of time, object and data utilities

scripts.testWithCoverage: nyc -r lcov -e .ts -x "*.test.ts" mocha -r ts-node/register src/**/*.test.ts && nyc report
scripts.prepare-build: npm run test && rimraf build && npm run transpile && copy README.md build
scripts.publish-prepatch: npm run prepare-build && npm version prepatch && ts-node export-package && npm publish build --tag dev
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-build && npm version patch    && ts-node export-package && npm publish build
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-build && npm version minor    && ts-node export-package && npm publish build
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-build && npm version major    && ts-node export-package && npm publish build

author: Jānis Radiņš
